devdoc.author: Masa Finance
devdoc.details: From this smart contract we can mint new Soulbound Identities and Soul Name NFTs. This minting can be done paying a fee in ETH, USDC or MASA

addAuthority(address).details: The caller must have the admin to call this function

constructor.details: Creates a new Soul Store, that has the role to minting new Soulbound Identities and Soul Name NFTs, paying a fee

params._nameRegistrationPricePerYear: Price of the default name registering in stable coin per year
params._soulBoundIdentity: Address of the Soulbound identity contract

disablePaymentMethod(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

enablePaymentMethod(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

getEnabledPaymentMethods().details: Returns the address of all available payment methods

returns._0: Array of all enabled payment methods

getNameRegistrationPricePerYear(uint256).details: Returns the price for registering per year in USD for an specific name length

returns._0: Price in stable coin for that name length

getPriceForMintingName(address,uint256,u.details: Returns current pricing for name minting for a given name length and years period

params.paymentMethod: Address of token that user want to pay
params.yearsPeriod: Years of validity of the name

returns._0: Current price of the name minting in the given payment method

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

purchaseIdentity().details: This function allows the purchase of a soulbound identity for free

returns._0: TokenId of the new soulbound identity

purchaseIdentityAndName(address,string,u.details: This function allows the purchase of a soulbound identity and name using stable coin (USDC), native token (ETH) or utility token (MASA)

params.name: Name of the new soul name
params.paymentMethod: Address of token that user want to pay
params.yearsPeriod: Years of validity of the name

returns._0: TokenId of the new soulbound identity

purchaseName(address,address,string,uint.details: This function allows the purchase of a soul name using stable coin (USDC), native token (ETH) or utility token (MASA)

params.name: Name of the new soul name
params.paymentMethod: Address of token that user want to pay
params.to: Address of the owner of the new soul name
params.yearsPeriod: Years of validity of the name

returns._0: TokenId of the new sou name

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMasaToken(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function It can be set to address(0) to disable paying in MASA

params._masaToken: New utility token to pay the fee in

setNameRegistrationPricePerYear(uint256,.details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

params._nameRegistrationPricePerYear: New price of the name registering per one year in stable coin for that name length per year

setReserveWallet(address).details: Let change the reserve walled. It can be triggered by an authorized account.

setSoulboundIdentity(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

setStableCoin(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

params._stableCoin: New stable coin to pay the fee in

setSwapRouter(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

setWrappedNativeToken(address).details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: The caller must have the owner to call this function

devdoc.title: Soul Store

addAuthority(address).notice: Adds a new authority to the list of authorities

disablePaymentMethod(address).notice: Removes a token as a valid payment method

enablePaymentMethod(address).notice: Adds a new token as a valid payment method

getNameRegistrationPricePerYear(uint256).notice: Returns the price of register a name per year in stable coin for an specific length

getPriceForMintingName(address,uint256,u.notice: Returns the price of the name minting

purchaseIdentity().notice: Mints a new Soulbound Identity purchasing it

purchaseIdentityAndName(address,string,u.notice: Mints a new Soulbound Identity and Name purchasing it

purchaseName(address,address,string,uint.notice: Mints a new Soul Name purchasing it

setMasaToken(address).notice: Sets the utility token to pay the fee in (MASA)

setNameRegistrationPricePerYear(uint256,.notice: Sets the price of the name registering per one year in stable coin

setSoulboundIdentity(address).notice: Sets the SoulboundIdentity contract address linked to this store

setStableCoin(address).notice: Sets the stable coin to pay the fee in (USDC)

setWrappedNativeToken(address).notice: Sets the wrapped native token address

userdoc.notice: Soul Store, that can mint new Soulbound Identities and Soul Name NFTs, paying a fee
